Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly can you provide an estimate?

Most estimates are provided within 24 hours, with many same-day responses. For urgent requests, call us directly at (866) 350-9407.

Are your estimates really free?

Yes! All estimates are completely free with no obligation. We believe in transparent pricing and want you to make an informed decision.

Do you offer evening or weekend consultations?

Absolutely! We understand busy schedules and offer flexible consultation times including evenings and weekends to accommodate your needs.

What information do you need for an accurate estimate?

We'll need basic information about your property size, type of cleaning needed, preferred frequency, and any special requirements. The more details you provide, the more accurate your estimate will be.
